channel.title: Is it safe to run server and another online game simultaneously?
channel.description:
Don't post if you've know clue what things like a RunServer are..
Okay, I'm just asking is it bad to run my server - not actual MoparScape, just the DOS-like runserver thing so people can play on my server without me having to be on it. Is it bad to run it while I also have up on my screen (full) Maple Story which is another Online game?
~~~~~~~~~~~ if you're wondering why I ask this then read:
I got bored and me and some friends decided to play some other online game.
So here's the thing, when I was playing sometimes it minimizes [it's a full screen game] When I'm on the desktop either my RunServer is just gone outa' nowhere or I look in it and see the server crashed.
If I try and start it back up right after it quickly closes saying something with "Fatal Error" If I exit Maple Story and start it up it works fine and I can turn Maple back on again.
Anyone know why it does this and if it's safe to run both?..
Help extremely appreciated =D

item.title: Is it safe to run server and another online game simultaneously?
item.dc:creator: @Simply_Z3R0 Simply Z3R0
item.description:
@Simply_Z3R0 wrote:

Because some people like my server and like to play it?..

I’m not ending it because I’m playing another game.

Read full topic
item.source: Is it safe to run server and another online game simultaneously?

item.title: Is it safe to run server and another online game simultaneously?
item.dc:creator: @Dragon_Fang Dragon Fang
item.description:
@Dragon_Fang wrote:

not at all, the runserver dosent take up alot of memory when its running…
btw, y u need 2 keep runserver on if u playing another game?

Read full topic
item.source: Is it safe to run server and another online game simultaneously?

item.title: Is it safe to run server and another online game simultaneously?
item.dc:creator: @jordan7 Jordan7
item.description:
@jordan7 wrote:

Ok Maple Story, um if you have a really fast computer then you could probably. But if you have a sucky one I wouldn’t lol. Also if your computer is about medium I wouldn’t go to channel 1

Read full topic
item.source: Is it safe to run server and another online game simultaneously?

Okay, I’m just asking is it bad to run my server - not actual MoparScape, just the DOS-like runserver thing so people can play on my server without me having to be on it.
Is it bad to run it while I also have up on my screen (full) Maple Story which is another Online game?
